segments.text: I cannot ignore her suggestion . In fact I always value her suggestion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . Maybe you will get the air if you go against her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it takes two to to make a happy marriage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And it takes two to make an agreement too . You have no guts , I am afraid .
segments.speaker: S2
